Container.Name: homechart
Container.Overview:
Homechart is a productivity application to manage your household data--budgets, tasks, recipes, and more. Homechart can run in your browser or on your Android and iOS devices via an app.
Requires POSTGRESQL 15 database to be set up All data is stored in database

Config.Name: homechart_app_adminEmailAddresses
Config.Description: Comma separated list of email addresses that will have admin access

Config.Name: homechart_app_baseURL
Config.Description: Base URL of the Homechart instance

Config.Name: homechart_app_signupDisabled
Config.Description: Set to true to disable sign up, new accounts can be created using admin console

Config.Name: homechart_database_uri
Config.Description: Database URI to connect with. Format is postgresql://username:password@hostname/database

Config.Name: homechart_smtp_fromAddress
Config.Description: Required for SMTP, email address to send from

Config.Name: homechart_smtp_hostname
Config.Description: Required for SMTP, hostname of SMTP server

Config.Name: homechart_smtp_password
Config.Description: Required for SMTP, password of SMTP server

Config.Name: homechart_smtp_port
Config.Description: Required for SMTP, port of SMTP server

Config.Name: homechart_smtp_port
Config.Description: Required for SMTP, username of SMTP server

Config.Name: homechart_webpush_vapidPrivateKey
Config.Description: Required for web push, can be generated using `homechart generate-vapid`

Config.Name: homechart_webpush_vapidPublicKey
Config.Description: Required for web push, can be generated using `homechart generate-vapid`
